argSrc: Yes, it's annoying and cumbersome to separate your rubbish properly all the time.
argTrg: Three different bin bags stink away in the kitchen and have to be sorted into different wheelie bins.

argSrc: Yes, it's annoying and cumbersome to separate your rubbish properly all the time.
argTrg: But still Germany produces way too much rubbish

argSrc: Yes, it's annoying and cumbersome to separate your rubbish properly all the time.
argTrg: and too many resources are lost when what actually should be separated and recycled is burnt.

argSrc: Yes, it's annoying and cumbersome to separate your rubbish properly all the time.
argTrg: We Berliners should take the chance and become pioneers in waste separation!
